analysis.description:

ZeroExExchangeHandler.staticExchangeChecks_ (/unique_chucks/24/0x6d2fffa3dae1a5f68e13bf4be837eb10078ceeb4.sol#1190-1214) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp <= data.expirationTimeSeconds && toBytes4(data.takerAssetData,0) == bytes4(0xf47261b0) && toBytes4(data.makerAssetData,0) == bytes4(0xf47261b0) && data.takerFee == 0 && (data.takerAddress == address(0x0) || data.takerAddress == address(this)) && (data.senderAddress == address(0x0) || data.senderAddress == address(this))) (/unique_chucks/24/0x6d2fffa3dae1a5f68e13bf4be837eb10078ceeb4.sol#1205-1214)
